query:
SELECT pt.id, pt.name as project_type, COUNT(mt.id) as template_count 
FROM project_types pt 
LEFT JOIN milestone_templates mt ON pt.id = mt.projectTypeId AND mt.isActive = 1
GROUP BY pt.id, pt.name
command:
